title: Louisville Slugger has a new logo. What's the serif typeface?
content:
Louisville Slugger released a new logo two days ago.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150315143240im_/http:/typophile.com/files/LouisvilleSlugger_5492.jpg)

Can anyone tell me the name of the serif typeface that is being used?
author: erinesullivan

comments.content: Close, but no match: Flange (Berthold) and Beaufort (Nick Shinn).
feels a lot like Pompei to me.
